Quick search

gillespy2.solvers.cython package¶

Submodules¶

gillespy2.solvers.cython.cython_ssa_solver module¶

class gillespy2.solvers.cython.cython_ssa_solver.CythonSSASolver¶

Bases: gillespy2.core.gillespySolver.GillesPySolver

This solver was deprecated in release version 1.3 of GillesPy2.

interrupted = False¶
name = 'CythonSSASolver'¶
rc = 0¶
classmethod run(model, t=20, number_of_trajectories=1, increment=0.05, seed=None, debug=False, profile=False, show_labels=True, **kwargs)¶

Call out and run the solver. Collect the results.

Parameters

  • model (gillespy.Model) – The model on which the solver will operate.

  • t (int) – The end time of the solver

  • number_of_trajectories (int) – The number of times to sample the chemical master equation. Each trajectory will be returned at the end of the simulation.

  • increment (float) – The time step of the solution

  • seed (int) – The random seed for the simulation. Defaults to None.

  • debug (bool) – Set to True to provide additional debug information about the simulation.

  • show_labels (bool) – Use names of species as index of result object rather than position numbers.

Returns

Simulation trajectories.

gillespy2.solvers.cython.cython_ssa_solver.convert_infix_prefix()¶

class gillespy2.solvers.cython.CythonSSASolver¶

Bases: gillespy2.core.gillespySolver.GillesPySolver

This solver was deprecated in release version 1.3 of GillesPy2.

interrupted = False¶
name = 'CythonSSASolver'¶
rc = 0¶
classmethod run(model, t=20, number_of_trajectories=1, increment=0.05, seed=None, debug=False, profile=False, show_labels=True, **kwargs)¶

Call out and run the solver. Collect the results.

Parameters

  • model (gillespy.Model) – The model on which the solver will operate.

  • t (int) – The end time of the solver

  • number_of_trajectories (int) – The number of times to sample the chemical master equation. Each trajectory will be returned at the end of the simulation.

  • increment (float) – The time step of the solution

  • seed (int) – The random seed for the simulation. Defaults to None.

  • debug (bool) – Set to True to provide additional debug information about the simulation.

  • show_labels (bool) – Use names of species as index of result object rather than position numbers.

Returns

Simulation trajectories.
